div.a: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 283 Attica, c. 1951 Burial: c. 140-130 B.C.? (T) Contents: 75 AE Athens: 1 3rd cent. (as Svoronos pl. 24, 51-7) 8 New Style (as Sv. pl. 24, 62-8) 20 "Delian" types (as Sv. pl. 106, 50 [1]; pl. 107, 55 ff. [19]) Disposition: Athens 29 as listed Varoucha, BCH 1952,p. 205
